changeSet.author: tmvumbi2
changeSet.comment: This change set migrates the BloodTestingRule table from an integer id primary key to a UUID of type BINARY(16).
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE BloodTestingRule ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE BloodTestingRule_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;
UPDATE BloodTestingRule_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN BloodTestingRule AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;
DELETE BloodTestingRule_AUD FROM BloodTestingRule_AUD LEFT JOIN BloodTestingRule AS joinTable ON (BloodTestingRule_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null
